Description.Text:
Position Situated in the heart of Cortina, on Corso Italia, 300 mts from the ski-lifts. Bus stop in front of the hotel.
Restaurant Breakfast buffet.
Outside
Lobby
More Informations Other facilities include: coffee bar and ice-cream parlour with sunny terrace, ski-deposit, internet point and garage on request. Check in: from 4 p.m. Check out: by 10 a.m.
